name: Environment X
description:
You play as Slaine, a spy from the infamous revolutionary group, Nebulos.  In order to infiltrate the evil Galaxis' large expansion project, Slaine must pose as one of her lackeys in order to get close to her and learn as much as they can, before it's too late.  Infiltrate Environment X and explore branching dialogue and multi-step quests that create an immersive world.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Camera: Mouse

Hold Shift: Run

Interact: Space

Tab: Open Quest Log
